name: Technical Support Specialist
description:
Our client, an international company specialising in the integration of Oracle solutions worldwide. They are looking for a Technical Support Specialist (Linux) for a new Oracle migration and support project for the largest retail company in Thailand.

We are looking for talented beginners who are willing to learn Oracle solutions and provide quality functional and technical assistance to the company's clients.

Opportunities:

  • Professional development within the company: opportunity to learn, grow and develop in Oracle technical support and/or move into internal development departments (Data/Java).

  • Official employment under the Labor Code of the Russian Federation.

  • Full medical insurance after the probationary period.

  • Working with an internationally experienced team on interesting and challenging projects.

  • English lessons with Cambridge FCE certification.

  • Business travel to Thailand.

  • Equipment for the work is provided by the company.

  • Working with the latest versions of Oracle.

Key tasks:

  • Incident, tasks and problem resolution.

  • Collecting, preparing and cleansing data about incidents according to instructions.

  • Handling documentation of already implemented solutions (e.g. training materials, user manuals).

Key skills and experience:

  • Knowledge of SQL, PL / SQL to prepare a general report.

  • English at least B1-B2 level.

  • Understanding of basic networking components and concepts (network, sub-network, network mask, IP, FQDN, DNS, Firewall, router, switch).

  • Understanding of incident systems and tools.
